DOC.brief_title: Repeatability Reproducibility Cirrus HD-OCT Macular Retinal Pigment Epithelium Elevation
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single site study . Ocular history examination conduct consented subject determine participation study . The study divide two phase . In Phase 1 , inter-device variability Cirrus HD-OCT measurement drusen area volume determine . In Phase 2 , inter-operator variability Cirrus HD-OCT measurement drusen area volume determine . In phase , Macular Cube 200 x 200 scan Macular Cube 512 x 128 scan evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 50 year age old diagnose dry AMD macular drusen . 2 . Drusen combine lesion geographic atrophy ( GA ) choroidal neovascularization . 3 . Able willing make require study visit . 4 . Able willing give consent follow study instruction . 1 . History retinal surgery , laser photocoagulation , and/or radiation therapy eye . 2 . Evidence retinal disease eye , include wet AMD , diabetic retinopathy , diabetic macular edema , significant vitreomacular traction . 3 . Thick medium opacity inability fixate precludes obtain acceptable scan . 4 . Concomitant use hydrochloroquine chloroquine . 5 . Unable make require study visit . 6 . Unable give consent follow study instruction .
